channel.title: Comments on: Asparagus, Broad Bean and Poached Egg Tart

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I love all the uses for puff pastry, Anita! This is such a pretty tart...for brunch, lunch or even dinner!
item.content:encoded: I love all the uses for puff pastry, Anita! This is such a pretty tart…for brunch, lunch or even dinner!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I can understand eating the broad beans before they get to the table. I grew them one year, and they rarely made it all the way to the kitchen! Your tarts look like a taste of spring.
item.content:encoded: I can understand eating the broad beans before they get to the table. I grew them one year, and they rarely made it all the way to the kitchen! Your tarts look like a taste of spring.

item.title: By: Lorraine Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine Not Quite Nigella
item.description: I love seasonal ingredients too! It gives you something to look forward to and asparagus is one of my favorites. I like how you've paired it with broad beans too Anita! :)
item.content:encoded: I love seasonal ingredients too! It gives you something to look forward to and asparagus is one of my favorites. I like how you’ve paired it with broad beans too Anita! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Emma @CakeMistress
item.dc:creator: Emma @CakeMistress
item.description:
A beautiful way to take advantage of our fresh produce. What a tasty and healthy breakfast.
Let me know if you discover the secret of great poached eggs, mine are terrible!
item.content:encoded:
A beautiful way to take advantage of our fresh produce. What a tasty and healthy breakfast.

Let me know if you discover the secret of great poached eggs, mine are terrible!

item.title: By: OohLookBel
item.dc:creator: OohLookBel
item.description: I'm also into broad beans and asparagus at the moment, and don't they go well with the poached egg? Good on you for shelling the beans; I'm lazy and use frozen!
item.content:encoded: I’m also into broad beans and asparagus at the moment, and don’t they go well with the poached egg? Good on you for shelling the beans; I’m lazy and use frozen!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Wow it looks so great :) really easy as well. Im home by myself tonight so might whip this up for a quick and healthy dinner. Thanks Anita!
item.content:encoded: Wow it looks so great ðŸ™‚ really easy as well. Im home by myself tonight so might whip this up for a quick and healthy dinner. Thanks Anita!

item.title: By: Quay Po Cooks
item.dc:creator: Quay Po Cooks
item.description: This is great simple meal. Healthy too. Your photos looks fabulous!
item.content:encoded: This is great simple meal. Healthy too. Your photos looks fabulous!

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: I love the simplicity and elegance of your dish
item.content:encoded:
